content: दीन {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [दी-क्त तस्प न] {@--1@} Poor, indigent. {@--2@} Distressed, ruined, afflicted, miserable, wretched. {@--3@} Sorry, dejected, melancholy, sad; सा विरहे तव दीना <ls>Gīt. 4.</ls> {@--4@} Timid, frightened. {@--5@} Mean, piteous; <ls>Bh. 2. 51.</ls> --नः A poor person, one in distress or misery; दीनानां कल्पवृक्षः <ls>Mk. 1. 48</ls>; दिनानि दीनोद्धरणोचितस्य <ls>R. 2. 25.</ls> --नं Distress, wretchedness. --ना The female of a mouse or shrew.
